TopicTitle: Is there a way to change KSP clock to 6 hours day?

Articles.Content: days on Kerbin last 6 hours but clock time shows a 24 hours cycle, I want to set the clock back to a 6 hours cycle, how can I do it?

It's in Gameplay Settings.  The control that you want is 'Display Kerbin Time'.

Here's a link to the relevant wiki page:

https://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Settings
